content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price of the apartment. What is the price you are willing to pay per month? Please note that I am aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I think a suitable price for this apartment would be around 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. What is your next offer? Remember, I am aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I think a price of 600 Euro per month would be more appropriate for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer. However, I am still looking for a higher price. What is your next offer? Remember, I am aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's condition and location, I propose 650 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is a better offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. What is your next offer? Remember, I am aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. As we are getting closer to my upper limit, I offer 700 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is a good offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. What is your next offer? Remember, I am aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think this is already a very reasonable price, considering the apartment's condition and location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your consideration. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, we can terminate it. Remember, the response for terminating the negotiation is 'TERMINATE'. So, 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
